bibl.bibl: Wagner, Johann Andreas. 1862. On a new fossil reptile supposed to be furnished with feathers. Annals and Magazine of Natural History 3d ser. 9: 261–7. Translated by W. S. Dallas. [Originally published as ‘Ein neues, angeblich mit Vogelfedern versehenes Reptil’ Sitzungsberichte der königl. bayerischen Akademie der Wissenschaften zu München 2 (1861): 146–54.]
